value.title: How I got stuck in a 34 day Subathon (never underestimate Twitch chat)
value.excerpt: I thought my subathon would last a day or two at most! Twitch chat had other ideas and locked me in for 34 days instead, allowing me to beat Ludwig's 726 hours on day 33.
